name: Dig Site Inspection (Skill Card)
text:
Jim / Skill
[ACTIVATION]
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
[EFFECT]
Once per turn, during your Draw Phase, before you draw, you can excavate the top card of your Deck, and place it on the top or bottom of the Deck. 
After you placed a second card to the bottom of your Deck with this Skill, flip this card over.
